name: Track Regional Sentiment from Social Media with Bright Data & OpenAI

user.name: Yaron Been
user.bio:
Building AI Agents and Automations | Growth Marketer | Entrepreneur | Book Author & Podcast Host

If you need any help with Automations, feel free to reach out via linkedin:
https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/

And check out my Youtube channel:
https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos

description:
*This workflow contains community nodes that are only compatible with the self-hosted version of n8n.*

This workflow automatically tracks regional sentiment across social media and news outlets, giving you a real-time pulse on how people in a specific area feel about your brand or topic.

## Overview

The automation queries Twitter, Reddit, and major news APIs filtered by geolocation. Bright Data handles location-specific scraping where APIs are limited. OpenAI performs sentiment and keyword extraction, aggregating scores into a daily report stored in Google Sheets and visualized in Data Studio.

## Tools Used

- **n8n** ‚Äì Coordinates all steps
- **Bright Data** ‚Äì Collects geo-targeted data beyond API limits
- **OpenAI** ‚Äì Runs sentiment analysis and topic modeling
- **Google Sheets** ‚Äì Houses cleaned sentiment metrics
- **Data Studio / Looker** ‚Äì Optional dashboard for visualization

## How to Install

1. **Import the Workflow** into n8n with the provided `.json`.
2. **Configure Bright Data** credentials.
3. **Set Up OpenAI** API key.
4. **Connect Google Sheets** and create a destination spreadsheet.
5. **Customize Regions & Keywords** in the Start node.

## Use Cases

- **Brand Monitoring**: Measure public opinion in target markets.
- **Political Campaigns**: Gauge voter sentiment by district.
- **Market Entry**: Understand regional attitudes before launching.
- **Crisis Management**: Detect negative spikes early.

## Connect with Me

- **Website**: https://www.nofluff.online
- **YouTube**: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
- **Get Bright Data**: https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25 (Using this link supports my free workflows with a small commission)

#n8n #automation #sentimentanalysis #geolocation #brightdata #openai #sociallistening #n8nworkflow #nocode #brandmonitoring

nodes.name: üåê Set Yelp URL (Weather Posts - Los Angeles)
üåê MCP Client: Scrape Weather Posts Data
ü§ñ AI Agent: Scrape Yelp Weather Posts and tailor campaigns

parameters.text:
=You are a data extraction agent.

Scrape the following Yelp search page for weather-related content in Los Angeles:
{{ $json.URL }}

For each business or post, extract the following details:

- `business_name`: The name of the business or event.
- `location`: The location of the business or event.
- `rating`: The Yelp rating of the business.
- `reviews_count`: The number of reviews the business has.
- `post_text`: The description or content provided about the weather (if available).
- `weather_related`: Any mention, problem, or fun of weather in the description or reviews (if available).

Additionally, perform **sentiment analysis** on the extracted weather-related text, and categorize the sentiment as **Positive**, **Negative**, or **Neutral**.

Based on the sentiment, create a **tailored campaign** for each weather-related post:
- **Positive Sentiment**: Recommend promoting **outdoor activities** or **sunny weather products** (e.g., sunscreen, sunglasses).
- **Negative Sentiment**: Suggest offering **rain-related products**, **indoor activities**, or **solutions** (e.g., umbrellas, warm drinks).
- **Neutral Sentiment**: Suggest promoting **general services** or **upcoming events**.

nodes.name: üìã Create Trello Card for Weather Campaign

parameters.name: Campaign

parameters.content:
-### üîπ **SECTION 1: Input URL & Trigger Workflow**

#### üß© **Nodes:**

1. **‚ö° Trigger: Manual Execution**

   * *New Name:* `üîò Trigger: Execute Workflow`

2. **üìù Set Yelp URL for Weather Posts in Los Angeles**

   * *New Name:* `üåê Set Yelp URL (Weather Posts - Los Angeles)`

#### üí° **What Happens:**

1. **Trigger the Workflow:** You manually **start the workflow** by clicking the **"Execute"** button in n8n.

2. **Input the URL for Yelp Data:**
   You **input the URL** for **weather-related Yelp posts** about **Los Angeles** (for example, `https://www.yelp.com/`). This URL is needed to scrape weather-related posts from Yelp.

#### ‚úÖ **How You Can Use It:**

* **Easily input URLs** for weather posts in any city or about any topic.
* **No coding needed**‚Äîjust copy-paste the URL to start the process!

### ü§ñ **SECTION 2: Scrape Data and Structure it**

#### üß© **Node:**

1. **ü§ñ AI Agent: Scrape Yelp Weather Posts**

   * *New Name:* `ü§ñ Agent: Scrape Yelp Weather Posts (Los Angeles)`

##### üß† **Sub-Nodes Inside the Agent:**

* **üß† OpenAI Chat Model**

  * *New Name:* `üí¨ AI Model: Process Weather Data`

* **üåê MCP Client: Scrape Weather Posts**

  * *New Name:* `üåê MCP Client: Scrape Weather Posts from Yelp`

* **üßæ Structured Output Parser**

  * *New Name:* `üìù Parse Scraped Data into JSON`

#### üí° **What Happens:**

* **AI Agent**:
  The **AI agent** uses the **Bright Data MCP Client** to **scrape weather-related posts** from Yelp about Los Angeles.

* **Sentiment Analysis**: The AI processes the data to identify the sentiment of the weather-related posts (e.g., positive, negative, or neutral).

* **Data Parsing**: After scraping the posts, the **output** is structured into a **JSON format** so it can be used for further analysis or task creation.

#### ‚úÖ **How You Can Use It:**

* This section **automates data scraping** from Yelp.
* It also provides **structured JSON data** that is easier to work with for further analysis.
* **No technical skills required**, just input the URL and let the agent scrape and structure the data automatically.

### üìã **SECTION 3: Create Trello Card for Campaign**

#### üß© **Node:**

1. **üì• Create Trello Card for Weather Campaign**

   * *New Name:* `üìã Create Trello Card: Weather Campaign`

#### üí° **What Happens:**

* After the weather data is scraped and structured, the workflow creates a **Trello card** that contains all the information about the weather-related posts and the sentiment analysis. This Trello card is used for **campaign management** and can be assigned to team members for further action.

#### ‚úÖ **How You Can Use It:**

* The Trello card acts as a **central place** to track and manage **weather-related campaigns**.
* You can **automatically create Trello cards** with all the campaign details, making it easier for your team to take the next steps in promoting the right products or services based on sentiment.

## üöÄ **Weather Campaign Automation Workflow**

This workflow helps you scrape **weather-related posts** from **Yelp** in **Los Angeles**, analyze the data, and automatically create a **Trello card** for campaign tracking.

---

### üîπ **SECTION 1: Input URL & Trigger Workflow**

#### üß© **Nodes:**

1. **‚ö° Trigger: Manual Execution**

   * *New Name:* `üîò Trigger: Execute Workflow`

2. **üìù Set Yelp URL for Weather Posts in Los Angeles**

   * *New Name:* `üåê Set Yelp URL (Weather Posts - Los Angeles)`

#### üí° **What Happens:**

1. **Trigger the Workflow:** You manually **start the workflow** by clicking the **"Execute"** button in n8n.

2. **Input the URL for Yelp Data:**
   You **input the URL** for **weather-related Yelp posts** about **Los Angeles** (for example, `https://www.yelp.com/`). This URL is needed to scrape weather-related posts from Yelp.

#### ‚úÖ **How You Can Use It:**

* **Easily input URLs** for weather posts in any city or about any topic.
* **No coding needed**‚Äîjust copy-paste the URL to start the process!

---

### ü§ñ **SECTION 2: Scrape Data and Structure it**

#### üß© **Node:**

1. **ü§ñ AI Agent: Scrape Yelp Weather Posts**

   * *New Name:* `ü§ñ Agent: Scrape Yelp Weather Posts (Los Angeles)`

##### üß† **Sub-Nodes Inside the Agent:**

* **üß† OpenAI Chat Model**

  * *New Name:* `üí¨ AI Model: Process Weather Data`

* **üåê MCP Client: Scrape Weather Posts**

  * *New Name:* `üåê MCP Client: Scrape Weather Posts from Yelp`

* **üßæ Structured Output Parser**

  * *New Name:* `üìù Parse Scraped Data into JSON`

#### üí° **What Happens:**

* **AI Agent**:
  The **AI agent** uses the **Bright Data MCP Client** to **scrape weather-related posts** from Yelp about Los Angeles.

* **Sentiment Analysis**: The AI processes the data to identify the sentiment of the weather-related posts (e.g., positive, negative, or neutral).

* **Data Parsing**: After scraping the posts, the **output** is structured into a **JSON format** so it can be used for further analysis or task creation.

#### ‚úÖ **How You Can Use It:**

* This section **automates data scraping** from Yelp.
* It also provides **structured JSON data** that is easier to work with for further analysis.
* **No technical skills required**, just input the URL and let the agent scrape and structure the data automatically.

---

### üìã **SECTION 3: Create Trello Card for Campaign**

#### üß© **Node:**

1. **üì• Create Trello Card for Weather Campaign**

   * *New Name:* `üìã Create Trello Card: Weather Campaign`

#### üí° **What Happens:**

* After the weather data is scraped and structured, the workflow creates a **Trello card** that contains all the information about the weather-related posts and the sentiment analysis. This Trello card is used for **campaign management** and can be assigned to team members for further action.

#### ‚úÖ **How You Can Use It:**

* The Trello card acts as a **central place** to track and manage **weather-related campaigns**.
* You can **automatically create Trello cards** with all the campaign details, making it easier for your team to take the next steps in promoting the right products or services based on sentiment.

---

### **Summary of the Workflow**

| **Section**                               | **What Happens**                                                                                                                   |
| ----------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **üîò Section 1: Input URL & Trigger**     | You **input the Yelp URL** for **weather posts in Los Angeles** and manually **trigger** the workflow.                             |
| **ü§ñ Section 2: Scrape & Structure Data** | The **AI Agent** scrapes **weather posts** from Yelp, performs **sentiment analysis**, and **structures** the data into **JSON**.  |
| **üìã Section 3: Create Trello Card**      | The scraped and structured data is used to **create a Trello card** for the **weather campaign**, allowing for team collaboration. |

---

### ‚úÖ **How This Workflow Helps You:**

| **Use Case**                        | **Benefit**                                                                                                   |
| ----------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| üå§ **Weather-Related Campaigns**    | **Automatically scrape weather posts** from Yelp for **Los Angeles**.                                         |
| üí¨ **Sentiment Analysis**           | Perform **sentiment analysis** on weather posts to tailor your **marketing campaigns**.                       |
| üìù **Trello for Campaign Tracking** | **Automatically create Trello cards** with campaign details for **easy tracking** and **team collaboration**. |

---

This workflow **automates** your process for scraping **weather-related posts** from Yelp, analyzing **sentiment**, and **tracking campaigns** in **Trello**. It makes it **easier to tailor your marketing strategies** and keeps your team on track.

[
  {
    "business_name": "About Time",
    "location": "Wilshire Center, Los Angeles, CA",
    "rating": "3.5",
    "reviews_count": 478,
    "post_text": "I love the garden, I want to sit inside in cold weather but there is no space. It is a very nice...",
    "weather_related": "Mention of cold weather and a garden suitable for sitting.",
    "sentiment": "Positive",
    "campaign_suggestion": "Promote outdoor activities and cozy garden seating for cooler weather.",
    "trello_card": {
      "title": "Campaign for About Time - Mention of cold weather and a garden suitable for sitting.",
      "description": "Location: Wilshire Center, Los Angeles, CA\nRating: 3.5\nReviews Count: 478\nSentiment: Positive\nCampaign: Promote outdoor activities and cozy garden seating for cooler weather.",
      "due_date": "2025-07-06",
      "labels": ["Positive"]
    }
  },
  {
    "business_name": "Grand Heating and Air Conditioning",
    "location": "Los Angeles, CA",
    "rating": "3.2",
    "reviews_count": 34,

    }
  },
  {

    "location": "Hancock Park, Los Angeles, CA",
    "rating": "1.9",
    "reviews_count": 14,
    "post_text": "The weather was getting warmer so I managed to catch Gabriella mgr in the lobby one day, and asked...",

    "sentiment": "Neutral",
    "campaign_suggestion": "Promote general services or upcoming community events for residents.",
    "trello_card": {
      "title": "Campaign for Ravenswood Apartments - Mention of warming weather.",
      "description": "Location: Hancock Park, Los Angeles, CA\nRating: 1.9\nReviews Count: 14\nSentiment: Neutral\nCampaign: Promote general services or upcoming community events for residents.",

      "labels": ["Neutral"]
    }
  },
  {

    "rating": "5.0",
    "reviews_count": 1,
    "post_text": "South of Carson, North of San Pedro. One of those areas of LA that don't get as much attention as their surrounding neighbors for one reason or...",

      "due_date": "2025-07-06",
      "labels": ["Neutral"]
    }
  }
]
